sentence.Network_en: Only the muddy water at Wrightwood flowed turbulently.
sentence.Network_cn: 在赖特伍德只有泥水才以涡流的方式流动.

sentence.Network_en: Under turbulently changing environments can enterprise survive through dynamic reconfiguration.
sentence.Network_cn: 在快速变化的市场环境下,企业只有通过动态重构才能生存.
